Name: Area: Documentation :page_facing_up:
Description: Improvements or additions to documentation

Name: Needs: Attention :wave:
Description: Needs attention from the maintainers

Name: Needs: Author Feedback :ear:
Description: Needs the author to provide feedback

Name: Needs: External Changes :gear:
Description: When an issue/PR requires changes that are outside of the control of this repo

Name: Needs: More Evidence :balance_scale:
Description: We are looking for more evidence to make a decision on this

Name: Needs: Triage :mag:
Description: Needs triaging by the team

Name: Needs: Upstream Policy Changes :arrows_clockwise:
Description: Built-in policy update required by owning product team

Name: Status: Blocked :collision:
Description: Something is blocking us from fixing this

Name: Status: Do Not Merge :no_entry:
Description: Do not merge PRs with this label attached as they are not ready etc.

Name: Status: External Contribution :earth_americas:
Description: This is being worked on by someone outside of the owners/contributors or core team

Name: Status: Help Wanted :sos:
Description: Extra attention is needed. Feel free to assist.

Name: Status: Long Term :hourglass:
Description: We will do it, but will take a longer amount of time due to complexity/priorities

Name: Status: No Recent Activity :zzz:
Description: No recent activity, will be closed automatically soon unless modified

Name: Status: PR Modified Workflows :warning:
Description: PR contains changes to GitHub Actions Workflows
